# Load Libraries

```{r load-packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(GGally)
library(ggplot2)
```

# Reading data file

```{r}
library(readr)
news <- read_csv("~/Desktop/Grad School/Winter 24/STA631/Activity 04/competition-files/data/news.csv")
```

# Splitting the data and saving files

```{r train-test}
# Setting the seed
set.seed(1)

#putting 80% of the data into a training set
news_split <- initial_split(news, prop = 0.80)

write.csv(news_split, "news_split.csv")

#assessing the two splits to csv
news_train <- training(news_split)
write.csv(news_train, "news_train.csv")

news_test <- testing(news_split)
write.csv(news_test, "news_test.csv")
```
